meanings.definition: The branch of dentistry dealing with the prevention and correction of irregular teeth.
meanings.sent2: My sister is studying orthodontia to become a dentist.
meanings.sent3: The tooth fairy must love orthodontia for all the straightening it does!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a masterpiece after the orthodontia treatment.
meanings.sent5: Orthodontia transforms smiles and boosts confidence.
